sentence.Network_en: Jan speaks eloquently about her art.
sentence.Network_cn: 简滔滔不绝地谈论起她的艺术作品。

sentence.Network_en: I was toasted by him most eloquently at the dinner.
sentence.Network_cn: 进餐时他口若悬河地向我祝酒.

sentence.Network_en: The poet eloquently expresses the sense of lost innocence.
sentence.Network_cn: 诗人动人地表达了失去天真的感觉.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(44) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... eloquent 雄辩的 eloquently 善辩地 else 别的.
跟着名人来读书：盘点全球知名CEO最爱读的书... ... biography 传记 eloquently 雄辩地 Mockingbird 模仿鸟.
The poet eloquently expresses the sense of lost innocence ., 诗人动人地表达了失去天真的感觉.
studying portraiture , I paid close attention to the people whose portraits told stories eloquently .在研究人像摄影时，我密切关注了那些用富有表现力的人像讲故事的人。

list.abs: No one can rival him in eloquence ., 在口才方面没有人能与他匹敌.
她是个很能干的人 She's a real go-getter.(指能干的人)她口才很好 She's eloquent她是个博览群书的人 She is a well-read girl
he addressed theaudience in an eloquent speech ., 他向听众发表了雄辩的演说.
unprofitable eloquence is like the cypress and tall , but bears no fruit .无益的雄辩如同高大的柏树，不会结果。

entry.tran: （言辞、文字等）表达生动的，有说服力的
entry.def: Speech or writing that is eloquent is well expressed and effective in persuading people.

example.ex: I heard him make a very eloquent speech at that dinner.
example.tran: 在那次晚宴上，我听到他作了一番非常有说服力的陈词。

entry.tran: 雄辩的;口才流利的;能言善辩的
entry.def: A person who is eloquent is good at speaking and able to persuade people.

example.ex: He was eloquent about his love of books.
example.tran: 他说起自己对书的喜爱来就会停不住嘴。
非常能言善辩的德国评论家

auth_sentence.content: Its robust durability and flexibility speak pretty eloquently.
auth_sentence.res_content: Its robust durability and flexibility speak pretty eloquently.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Its robust durability and flexibility speak pretty eloquently.

auth_sentence.content: The statistics speak eloquently on his behalf.
auth_sentence.res_content: The statistics speak eloquently on his behalf.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The statistics speak eloquently on his behalf.

auth_sentence.content: But a thick cluster of empty-handed tour guides speaks more eloquently than statistics.
auth_sentence.res_content: But a thick cluster of empty-handed tour guides speaks more eloquently than statistics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But a thick cluster of empty-handed tour guides speaks more eloquently than statistics.

sentences.en: I was toasted by him most eloquently at the dinner.
sentences.cn: 进餐时他口若悬河地向我祝酒。

sentences.en: She spoke eloquently about the need for action.
sentences.cn: 她雄辩地阐述了采取行动的必要性。

sentences.en: The poet eloquently expresses the sense of lost innocence.
sentences.cn: 诗人动人地表达了失去天真的感觉。
